price: A to što te oni smatraju lažnim – pa i prije njih su narod Nuhov, i Ad, i Semud poslanike smatrali lažnim,
arabic: وَإِن يُكَذِّبُوكَ فَقَدۡ كَذَّبَتۡ قَبۡلَهُمۡ قَوۡمُ نُوحٖ وَعَادٞ وَثَمُودُ

version.title: Bosnian translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Bosnian by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: wa-in yukadhibūka faqad kadhabat qablahum qawmu nūḥin waʿādun wathamūdu
